title: Grow
description: Grow is a learning management platform where teachers can manage courses and students can enroll, access lessons, and download study materials. This project helped me build a strong foundation in Laravel, MVC structure, routing, and fullstack application flow.
responsibilities: Developed fullstack modules including authentication, course CRUD, and enrollment logic
Implemented UI using Bootstrap and integrated dynamic components with JavaScript
Designed database schema for courses, modules, teachers, and students
Handled file downloads and user access control
achievements: This was the project where I understood Laravel deeply and learned how to structure a fullstack application from scratch.

title: AMS
description: AMS is an Attendance Management System designed for companies to track employee attendance efficiently. Users can manage teams, assign roles, and export attendance reports in multiple formats.
responsibilities: Developed core backend modules including employee CRUD, team assignment, and attendance tracking
Implemented export reports in PDF and Excel format
Created responsive UI dashboards using Bootstrap
Handled authentication and role-based access control
achievements: Gained practical understanding of SaaS systems and multi-tenant architecture.

title: Bhansha
description: Bhansha is a restaurant management system where customers can browse products, place orders, and pay online, while admins manage menu items and verify orders.
responsibilities: Implemented fullstack CRUD for products, orders, and customers
Integrated payment gateway and cart system
Built order history and admin verification workflows
Created responsive frontend with Bootstrap and jQuery
achievements: Gained experience integrating payments and building fullstack web applications.

title: Dragon Alliance Metal (DAM)
description: DAM is a company website to manage products and customer requests. The system allows admins to manage content and communicate with customers through emails.
responsibilities: Developed backend CRUD operations for products and customer requests
Implemented emailing notifications for customer inquiries
Designed database models and relationships
Integrated admin dashboard for easy management
features: CRUD management for products and orders
achievements: Strengthened my skills in backend development and API integration for live company projects.

title: Grace International
description: Grace International is a consultancy project where clients can book appointments and admins can manage consultancy records efficiently.
responsibilities: Developed CRUD operations for consultancy records
Implemented appointment booking system
Created responsive frontend using jQuery and Bootstrap
Managed database schema for clients and appointments
features: Responsive UI for users and admin
achievements: Gained experience in freelance development and end-to-end project handling.

title: Sacred Valley Treks
description: Sacred Valley Treks is a tour and trekking management website. Admins can manage trekking packages, and customers can submit requests for tours.
responsibilities: Developed backend APIs for tours and trekking packages
Managed database design for bookings and requests
Handled admin CRUD operations and user authentication
Integrated API for customer requests management
achievements: Enhanced my skills in backend development and API integration for live client projects.

title: Silambam
description: Silambam is a game report management system where judges can assign marks to players and admins can generate detailed reports.
responsibilities: Developed backend modules for player, judge, and group management
Integrated API authentication for mobile app judges
Built admin dashboard to view detailed score reports
Handled database design and relationships
achievements: Learned API authentication, mobile integration, and ERP-like backend systems.

title: GY Health Care
description: GY Health Care is a simple web application for healthcare management, enabling clients to manage records, appointments, and resources.
responsibilities: Built fullstack modules for managing patient and healthcare records
Created dynamic UI for admin and client interaction
Implemented backend logic and database structure for all features
Integrated API endpoints where required
achievements: Built complete dynamic features and strengthened fullstack development skills.

title: MDPL
description: MDPL is a large-scale ERP system handling multiple company workflows. I contributed to backend API handling, feature development, and maintenance.
responsibilities: Developed backend APIs for ERP modules
Implemented JWT-based API authentication
Maintained existing modules and fixed bugs
Integrated queue-based tasks and jobs for background processing
Optimized database queries for large datasets
Worked with team to implement modular architecture and maintain coding standards
features: API endpoints for various ERP workflows
JWT authentication for secure API access
Background jobs and queues for processing
achievements: Strengthened backend and API skills; learned large-scale ERP architecture and maintenance of complex systems.

title: Sitara
description: Sitara is a hospital ERP project managing hospitals, clinics, doctors, patients, and HR workflows. I contributed mainly on backend modules and report generation.
responsibilities: Developed backend modules for hospital and clinic management
Implemented report generation and optimized code for performance
Integrated API authentication using Sanctum
Maintained database schema and relationships for hospital ERP system
Worked on Jobs and Queues for background processes
achievements: Improved performance, reliability, and gained experience in hospital ERP systems and backend optimizations.

title: Great Ticket
description: Great Ticket is a multi-tenant SaaS event management and ticketing system. I worked on fullstack development, API handling, and real-time features.
responsibilities: Implemented backend and frontend features for event and ticket management
Integrated Sanctum API authentication for mobile and web clients
Developed dynamic seat selection and QR code generation
Built checkout flow with coupon validation and order summary
Optimized database queries for multi-tenant architecture
Handled Jobs and Queues for notifications and background processes
Maintained existing codebase and added new features according to client requirements
features: Real-time API for mobile and web apps
achievements: Built end-to-end SaaS system with fullstack capabilities, learned multi-tenant design, and implemented advanced real-time and background processing features.
